//: 255 mm/10 in barrel. Somewhat like sawn-off Mosin AKA Obrez, except factory standard and burst capable. Like in the AKS-74U, the round remains lethal beyond the effective range but extremely unlikely to hit anything.
description: The .308 Stockless Marksman Carbine, the first gun among OmniCorp products, is a selective-fire "sidearm" which shares ammo with battle rifles and uses a very compact delayed blowback action. Includes critically needed folding wire stock despite being named a "stockless" carbine . Unlike the .300 WM and .223 versions, this one is fed by its own 4-round tubular magazine.
